## User / Author membership plan condition

**User membership plan** condition checks the plan of the current user. While **Author membership plan** condition checks the plan of the author of the post or page.

## Example usage

Using **User membership plan** condition you can restrict access to content on your site, requiring the user to buy a certain plan to unlock it.

Using **Author membership plan** condition, you can restrict content that an author can display on their own post, depending on their membership plan.
